channel.title: [Resolved] Any plans to enable N-best with RapidEars? – Politepix

item.title: [Resolved] Any plans to enable N-best with RapidEars?
item.dc:creator: dashersw
item.description: Hello, n-best would be a perfect solution for many applications that require live recognition. Is it possible to support it and do you plan to add the feature?

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Any plans to enable N-best with RapidEars?
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

Thanks for the suggestion â€“ I’ll give it some consideration.

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Any plans to enable N-best with RapidEars?
item.dc:creator: pizigi
item.description:
+1 on N-Best with RapidEars. I gave up on purchasing RapidEars because N-Best is such a crucial element for the quality of my live numbers recognition application. No N-Best is a deal breaker for me.
Come on Halle, you can do it, mobiles devices are so powerful these days ;)

item.title: Reply To: [Resolved] Any plans to enable N-best with RapidEars?
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description: All right, you all might want to check out the RapidEars 2.0 header file ;) .
